overview: Filmed in 1997, Young Americans has a powerhouse cast of classic gay porn stars. The shyness and limitations of college are soon swept away as they forget the books and get down to the detailed studying of their own beautiful youthful bodies!
tagline: Nine college boys get to study each other's hot bodies
title: Young Americans
